Donating Breast Milk to the 
Human Milk Bank 
In Northern Ireland the Human 
Milk Bank is located within the 
South West Acute Hospital, 
Enniskillen. The Human 
Milk Bank always welcomes 
prospective donors.  If you 
wish to become a milk donor 
you will be asked to undergo 
medical screening consisting 
of a questionnaire and a 
blood test.  The don
